text:
One other issue first: Wouldn't it be much more comfortable to add a
ready-to-depoy war-file to the bin-distribution?

creator: s.mueller@salzburg.co.at
vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
Enum issues are fixed long time ago in svn trunk, so this issue isn't valid.
Support for DOM3 is not implemented, so JDK1.5 still can be a problem.

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
PS For a war file, see "Binary (Webapp)" on download page:
http://xml.apache.org/xindice/download.cgi
